items.title: Small Event Catering
items.blurb: Planning a dinner party? Overwhelmed with creating a delciious and beautiful menu? Let us take over! We will decide on a menu together. The day of the event, we will prepare the meal in your kitchen so it is fresh and delicious.

items.title: Personal Chef
items.blurb: Cooking fresh and delicious meals every day can be daunting. Let us step in to help. We will work together to create a meal plan specifically for you and your dietary needs. We shop for the food, cook in your kitchen, and ease the stress of the week.
